title: "Binary Backdrop"
content: Welcome to our website, where you'll find a sleek and modern design featuring a repeating pattern of binary code. Our website is the perfect backdrop for those who appreciate simplicity and minimalism. With a black and white color scheme and a simple font, our wallpaper creates a striking visual effect that is sure to impress. Whether you're looking for inspiration or just need a clean and stylish background for your desktop or mobile device, our website has got you covered. So why wait? Check out our binary backdrop today and take your digital experience to the next level!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of binary code, in a simple font and black and white color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
